name: Super Gala Omega
description:
Hello there.

This is my first game. It's called "Super Gala Omega". I created this in GameMaker: Studio 1.4

If you're wondering why I named that, the reason is simple : It's because of a game that the character (Chiaki Nanami from Danganronpa 2) is playing. Also the ship in the game is inspired by the hairpin that Chiaki Nanami have.

I should mention that the game took me around a month to develop (because I'm just a beginner at developing and learn how to program took me around a year and a half.)

-----------

Instructions (How to play) :

- Simply move your mouse to control the ship.

-----------

And that's it for now, I hope you'll enjoy the game as much as I enjoy making it and I really can't wait to release my next game.
